TopicTitle: hello from the great land of Delaware

Articles.Content:
i've been on the kerbal train for about three years now. the game is fan-freaking-tastic on its own, and i've been holding off on getting into the modding side of the game until 1.0 because of stability reasons

now that i'm venturing into this unknown land of community funtimes i am confronted with an issue

i have no clue where to install these mods

any help would be appreciated by this mod n00bm@ster

Hello from the greater land of PA!

To install a mod, click the download button for the mod. Open the .zip file and follow any special instructions. I recommend reading the "ReadMe" file first. If there are no special instructions, simply copy and paste the mod's game data folder to KSP's Game Data folder. Open up KSP and enjoy!
